childElements.name: AddStandingInstructionValidateDateSelection
childElements.propertySetConfig:
{ "controlWidth" : 2, "label" : "", "showInputWidth" : false, "inputWidth" : 12, "expression" : "IF(%AddStandingInstructionPaymentOption%=='Duration'&& %AddStandingInstructionStartDate%!=null && %AddStandingInstructionEndDate%!=null, 
IF((%AddStandingInstructionFrequency%=='Monthly' && DATEDIFF(DATE(%AddStandingInstructionStartDate%),DATE(%AddStandingInstructionEndDate%))<30),true,
IF((%AddStandingInstructionFrequency%=='Quarterly' && DATEDIFF(DATE(%AddStandingInstructionStartDate%),DATE(%AddStandingInstructionEndDate%))<90),true,
IF((%AddStandingInstructionFrequency%=='Half-yearly' && DATEDIFF(DATE(%AddStandingInstructionStartDate%),DATE(%AddStandingInstructionEndDate%))<180),true,
IF((%AddStandingInstructionFrequency%=='Yearly' && DATEDIFF(DATE(%AddStandingInstructionStartDate%),DATE(%AddStandingInstructionEndDate%))<365),true,
false
)))))", "hide" : true, "show" : null, "mask" : null, "dataType" : null, "hideGroupSep" : false, "dateFormat" : "MM-dd-yyyy", "HTMLTemplateId" : "", "disOnTplt" : false }

{ "disOnTplt" : false, "HTMLTemplateId" : "", "dateFormat" : "MM-dd-yyyy", "hideGroupSep" : false, "dataType" : null, "mask" : null, "show" : null, "hide" : true, "expression" : "IF(%UpdateStandingInstructionPaymentOption%=='Duration'&& %UpdateStandingInstructionStartDate%!=null && %UpdateStandingInstructionEndDate%!=null, 
IF((%UpdateStandingInstructionFrequency%=='Monthly' && DATEDIFF(DATE(%UpdateStandingInstructionStartDate%),DATE(%UpdateStandingInstructionEndDate%))<30),true,
IF((%UpdateStandingInstructionFrequency%=='Quarterly' && DATEDIFF(DATE(%UpdateStandingInstructionStartDate%),DATE(%UpdateStandingInstructionEndDate%))<90),true,
IF((%UpdateStandingInstructionFrequency%=='Half-yearly' && DATEDIFF(DATE(%UpdateStandingInstructionStartDate%),DATE(%UpdateStandingInstructionEndDate%))<180),true,
IF((%UpdateStandingInstructionFrequency%=='Yearly' && DATEDIFF(DATE(%UpdateStandingInstructionStartDate%),DATE(%UpdateStandingInstructionEndDate%))<365),true,
false
)))))", "inputWidth" : 12, "showInputWidth" : false, "label" : "", "controlWidth" : 2 }
